name: Together (itch) (PurpleSunsetGames)
description:
A little two-player game (based on the theme "togetherness") where you lose health if you're to far from each other,  you heal when you're closer, and you must get points while dodging bullets and being careful not to stay apart for too long. 

Gain points by touching the shape that matches your character at the same time as the other player. The more points you get, the harder the game will get.

Square is controlled with W,A,D and circle is controlled with Up, Left, and Right arrow keys. Touch support and three-player control are on the list of goals!
